channel.title: [PI] client sprites
channel.description:
How do you change the sprites on your client? for example: changing the map area from 474 to a 508 one. changing the background that loads up as you open your client. and changing the login box.
please don't just tell me it's in the sprite.java folder.. because all i see in there is codes.. so i'm guessing you have too switch the sprites first and then put a code into that so it actually projects that image. Also please explain in full step-by-step detail.. i'm a little slow today.
-thanks

item.title: [PI] client sprites
item.dc:creator: @klub5tep klub5tep
item.description:
@klub5tep wrote:

How do you change the sprites on your client?
for example:
changing the map area from 474 to a 508 one.
changing the background that loads up as you open your client.
and changing the login box.

please don’t just tell me it’s in the sprite.java folder… because all i see in there is codes… so i’m guessing you have
too switch the sprites first and then put a code into that so it actually projects that image.
Also please explain in full step-by-step detail… i’m a little slow today.
